pullRequest.title: Update the nightly dev versions to conform to release policies documentation
pullRequest.bodyText:
The release documentation for nightly dev builds states that the dev version should be X.Y.Z-dev.YYYYMMDD.r where r is based on the number of builds performed (on that pipeline) on the given day. For libraries that were beta, this was getting tacked on to the end.
If a given version was 1.0.0-beta.1, the nightly dev version should be 1.0.0-dev.20200616.5.

nodes.bodyText: Just an FYI - These space removals are from me turning on the option to remove trailing space in VS Code. This is goodness.

             f.write(line)

commit.message: Update python to fix a small syntax error

nodes.bodyText: gah...this snuck in there because I'd accidentally submitted a mangled version_client.txt and reverting that also killed the last change to this file which was removal of this syntax error.
